name: Present Hoarder
description:
This is my submission for the Awful Game Jam 2018. The point of the game is to collect as many presents as possible, making sure to keep the really expensive ones. The expensive ones are represented by the Black Boxed presents. 

Controls: Just click the presents. (Mouse def required)

The game team consisted of me, Braymen, and the Designer, The Price of Oil.
